trans-unit.source: Provides a synchronization context for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).
trans-unit.target: Offre un contesto di sincronizzazione per Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is not specified at the creation of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext> instance, the current <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> non viene specificato al momento della creazione del <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext> istanza corrente <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> è associato il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> class by using the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> utilizzando l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> to associate this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> with.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> da associare a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> mediante l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dispatcher" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dispatcher" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> to associate this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> with.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> da associare a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The priority used to send and post callback methods.
trans-unit.target: Priorità utilizzata per inviare i metodi di callback.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" /> mediante l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The copy of this synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: Copia del contesto di sincronizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: Delegato da chiamare.

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto passato al delegato.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the callback in the synchronization context asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Richiama in modo asincrono il callback nel contesto di sincronizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The delegate is put in the dispatcher queue at a priority of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal>.
trans-unit.target: Il delegato viene inserito nella coda del dispatcher a una priorità di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext.Post%2A> starts an asynchronous request to post a message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext.Post%2A> Avvia una richiesta asincrona per inviare un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="d" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: Delegato da chiamare.

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto passato al delegato.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the callback in the synchronization context synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Richiama in modo sincrono il callback nel contesto di sincronizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The delegate is put in the dispatcher queue at a priority of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal>.
trans-unit.target: Il delegato viene inserito nella coda del dispatcher a una priorità di <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="d" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="d" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the native operating system handles.
trans-unit.target: Matrice contenente gli handle nativi del sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to wait for all handles; <see langword="false" /> to wait for any handle.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per attendere tutti gli handle; <see langword="false" /> per attendere un handle qualsiasi.

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait, or <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (-1) to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: Numero di millisecondi di attesa oppure <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (-1) per un'attesa indefinita.

trans-unit.source: Waits for any or all the elements in the specified array to receive a signal.
trans-unit.target: Attende che uno qualsiasi o tutti gli elementi della matrice specificata ricevano un segnale.

trans-unit.source: The array index of the object that satisfied the wait.
trans-unit.target: Indice della matrice dell'oggetto che ha soddisfatto l'attesa.
